column6: The Carriage House is an upstairs apartment located in the heart of Aransas Pass. \nIt is walking distance to grocery (HEB), parks, and the civic (convention) center. Conn Brown Harbor and fishing is right down the road! It's only a short drive away from historic Rockport, Port Aransas, and downtown Corpus Christi. \nYouâ€™ll love this place because it is located in a quiet, historic neighborhood. This place is great for couples, adventurers, business travelers, and families.
